title: The Sabotaged Presentation
premise: The quarterly earnings presentation was corrupted with embarrassing memes right before the board meeting. The file was modified at 7:12 AM from a computer in the office.

suspects.name: Owen Marsh
suspects.motive: His projections were wrong and he feared being blamed during the presentation
suspects.alibi: I arrived at the office at 8 AM as usual. Before that I was at the gym on Fifth Street. I swim laps every morning from 6 to 7:30 AM.

suspects.name: Diane Cho
suspects.motive: Being transferred to another department against her wishes starting next week
suspects.alibi: I got to the office early at 6:45 AM to prepare coffee and materials for the board meeting. I was setting up the boardroom from 6:50 until 8 AM.

suspects.name: Liam Beckett
suspects.motive: Passed over for a raise he was promised three months ago
suspects.alibi: I was running late and didn't arrive until 8:30 AM. I overslept because my apartment building had a fire alarm at 3 AM that kept everyone up.

suspects.name: Yuki Tanaka
suspects.motive: Wants to prove the company needs better cybersecurity and a bigger IT budget
suspects.alibi: I came in at 7 AM to run server backups. I was in the server room the entire time until 8:15 AM. The server room has no access to shared network drives.

clues.title: Computer Login Records
clues.content: The file was modified from a workstation on the third floor. Login records show only Diane's credentials were used on that floor between 6:30 and 7:30 AM.

clues.title: Janitor's Account
clues.content: The night janitor, who left at 7 AM, says he saw Diane carrying coffee supplies into the boardroom on the second floor at 6:55 AM, not on the third floor.

clues.title: Gym Membership Records
clues.content: Fifth Street Gym confirms Owen checked in at 6:05 AM and checked out at 7:05 AM. The gym is a twenty-minute drive from the office, making a 7:12 AM file edit impossible.
